egg.content: You have been gifted an egg, it looks like its going to hatch!

name.content: What would you like to name your BORB?

tutorial.content: let's learn how to care for [name].

feeding.content: [name] will grow hungry with time, to feed it simply text feed or send a food emoji!

cleaning.content: [name] and its virtual home need a good cleaning.  Text clean or send a cleaning emoji to clean up after your pet!

playing.content: [name] will grow bored over time, make sure to keep it entertained!  Text play or send a playing emoji to start a game with your pet!

BORB points.content: As you interact with [name], you will earn point for caring for it. These points can be exchanged for things in the BORB shop.

shopping.content: To open the BORB shop text shop or send a shopping emoji.

status.content: To check your pet's status, text status.  Keep those points from getting too low otherwise your pet may die or run away!
